pkgmetadata.longdescription: Streamline Descriptive Analysis of Quantitative Data Matrices // Methods which streamline the descriptive analysis of quantitative matrices. Matrix columns are samples while rows are features i.e. proteins, genes. Includes methods for visualization (e.g. Heatmaps, Volcanos, pairwise QQ, Bland- Altman plot), summary statistics (e.g. CV), data normalization methods (e.g. robustscale). Read function for Progenesis.
